name: Timeless (itch) (shoegazer)
description:
How to play:

Overworld controls:

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Space bar near a npc (static dot) to enter a battle
  • White squares are cards to pick up
  • You can only have up to 10 cards in your deck

Battle tutorial

  • In this game each card have a timer in the right corner, each turn all the placed cards have -1 on their timer
  • When it reachs 0 the card is 'resolved', the effect noted with 'Reso' in front is activated and the card comes back to your hand
  • Some cards have a 'Turn' effect, it activates every turn
  • There are 3 types of card: Attack, Defense and Spell
  • When multiple cards are resolved at the same time, the effects are applied in the order: spell > defense > attack
  • You can play 1 card each turn
  • Your life and defense are shown by the heart and shield in the lower right corner and your opponent's are in the top left corner
